Text: TV Team - if you use words like fag you must be a religious bigot or some kind of pedophile.  Are you a dirty pedo TV Team?
Just because you use the word fag, that does not make you a bigot or pedophile. Gay men are closer to being pedophiles, let's be real! Besides, if you are religious then you know you are a sinner!

Let's be very real - most pedophiles are married with kids - does that sound like you subbz?  If you are religious asnd anti-gay then yopu have more in common with Adolph Hitler than you realize.  Are you a religious Naxi subbz?  Do you follow your Nazi pope who praises murderers and condemns innocent gay people?  Really get over your hatred of gays - it just makes you look very ugly!
